main event: Multiple witnesses observed cigar-shaped objects flying in a triangular formation over Vuyyuru, India on 27 April 1956.
interesting points: Witnesses reported a total of five objects moving silently at an estimated speed of 200 mph,The objects were described as having a luminous trail,The sighting lasted for 22 seconds,Various conclusions were drawn regarding the nature of the objects, including possibilities of them being balloons or aircraft,This event was interpreted by the U.S. Air Force and involved at least fifty to sixty witnesses.
witness description: A retired U.S. Air Force captain along with local residents
